data.text: “The success of a concert depends on various people working together as a team. The same applies to flying.” ✈️ 🎻 First Officer Jan Liebich talks about his passion for two completely different things: aviation and music. Check out the interview here:
When you get the pleasure of enjoying this kind of view on your flight. 😍 What do you prefer: window or aisle seat? https://t.co/aX5SiqX5HT
Founded in 1630 – and thus historic by American standards – the city is widely regarded as one of the most cultured in the USA. Discover Boston in our latest double issue of the SWISS Magazine.

We are happy to welcome back a familiar face. Dominic was once our Instagramer of the Month last year and reported about his work as a flight attendant. Now that he has completed his FCG training, we have the pleasure of gaining insights into SWISS First. Find out more:
🛫 What an impressive shot of our Boeing 777 taking off at LAX! 😍 What is your favourite Airport that SWISS flies to? 🛬 https://t.co/AdCaHlka57

data.text: SWISS will be adding two weekly flights from Zurich to #Dublin in the coming winter schedules starting October 28. The new service will provide passengers with a total of nine weekly connections to the Irish Capital. https://t.co/PedY0rl0hf

#PrideMonth2019
#BeProud

data.text: Many thanks to Sales for this impressive month! His passion for the pilot's profession is particularly noticeable thanks to his fascinating videos and beautiful photos. We are now pleased to share some highlights from our last Instagramer of the month with you. https://t.co/UhKzNGpuDe

To the women and men who remain alert when everyone else is asleep, who comfort and care for our passengers, to those who ensure our safety: THANK YOU! ❤️ #InternationalFlightAttendantDay https://t.co/M1UWsJtbXZ

The Public Transport Strike in the Netherlands for 28 May will have effects on the public transport connectivity of Amsterdam Shiphol airport. Please allow extra time when travelling to the airport. We also estimate flight arrival & departure delays: https://t.co/BKCt1V3Vs8 https://t.co/DibOtoQtja

data.text: We thank First Officer Sascha for his great contribution as Instagramer of the Month in April. Since we liked it so much, we picked some highlights for you to enjoy once more. https://t.co/HZQQBXYrIn

SWISS reports a decline in its earnings for the first quarter of 2019: Adjusted EBIT was down 54 per cent at CHF 48.3 million. While SWISS’s first-quarter earnings for 2019 show a decline from their 2018 level, they are still above the average of the past few years.

In May, SWISS is celebrating the tenth anniversary of its culinary collaboration with @hiltl. To honour the occasion, SWISS will be offering an exclusively vegetarian three-course Hiltl meal option on selected long-haul flights.

data.text:
🍫 Your Easter Weekend is about to get a whole lot happier with our Easter Specials on board! 🐇
SWISS Business passengers can also look forward to "egg-tapping", or as we call it: "Eiertütschete". https://t.co/4DCeYQj7zL
What a beautiful shot from high above the clouds! Happy weekend everyone! https://t.co/Ya4hLUwXHR
A beautiful take-off that immediately evokes travel emotions. Have a good start into the weekend. https://t.co/kywAge4Ctl
SWISS transported 3,808,356 passengers in the first three months of 2019, 2.1% more than in the same period last year. Find more information here: https://t.co/uf0Rre4jjX https://t.co/kddoxvyHLB

“To be a flight attendant – that’s my dream!” After a childhood blighted by adversities, the orphan Zula was taken into an SOS Children’s Village. Today the twenty-year-old is studying tourism management. Learn more of her deeply moving story in our current blog article.
Never heard of “Sechseläuten”? Here are the ten most important facts about Zurich’s traditional spring festival: https://t.co/WYXNubkUYt
In case of gloomy weather, just look forward to days with clear blue skies like these. Happy weekend everyone! https://t.co/6CV4uNxHBR

data.text: Sunrise over the alps looks majestic as always! If you think you can top this view, tag us in your picture with #flyswiss. https://t.co/WwipYWkpvx
🥇SWISS named Switzerland’s most attractive employer for the second year running through the 2019 @RandstadCH Award: https://t.co/VOy2aQuAKk https://t.co/9bf6aIRtMP

For over 15 years, SWISS has been collecting coins and notes in all currencies on board its long-haul flights to support SOS Children’s Villages. Find out more about SOS Children’s Villages and the donations from SWISS passengers in our current blog post.
Epic landing approach to Porto airport over the city and the Douro river ✈️ Enjoy your weekend! https://t.co/dJgrH33v8I

data.text: As per financial year 2018, SWISS will compensate CO2-emissions of all staff duty trips via @myclimate. In addition we support global initiatives such as CORSIA by @icao to compensate CO2-emissions. #LX_pressconference https://t.co/cRXJZ2mirh

SWISS CEO Thomas Klühr on the climate debate: “SWISS is continuously committed to reducing its environmental impact. Over the last 15 years, it has reduced its fuel consumption by almost 30% by investing more than CHF 8 billion in a more efficient fleet.” #LX_pressconference

At the #LX_pressconference, SWISS CEO Thomas Klühr explains that 2019 will remain challenging in terms of a stable flight operations due to limited capacities within the European airspace. However, SWISS has initiated a program to optimize its flight operations in summer 2019.
SWISS introduces a new Premium Economy Class on its long-haul aircraft from spring 2021! Find more information here: https://t.co/iMYrNv7678 #LX_pressconference https://t.co/UwCxRUKemk

«I am delighted and proud that together with the SWISS team we have reached an EBIT-margin of more than 8% for the fourth consecutive time”, says SWISS CEO Thomas Klühr on the occasion of the annual press conference. #LX_pressconference
SWISS transported 1,157,740 passengers in February, an increase of 1.2% on the same month last year. Find more information here: https://t.co/gtrzQSeHHt . https://t.co/9XVahf5Vpc

SWISS reports a record of CHF 636 million Adjusted EBIT - the highest operating profit ever recorded in our company’s history to date. More information: https://t.co/VwZgzO4VNy  #LX_pressconference https://t.co/2MpnVNGxkQ

SWISS teamed up with @Bally to create a new SWISS First amenity kit. The new kit has been crafted to appeal women and men alike and will make your stay on board SWISS First even more comfortable. https://t.co/s28aFOgwld
Stunning window seat views after takeoff from Geneva 😍 ✈️ Happy Weekend! https://t.co/gaPlrvHzG5

“Becoming a pilot was my plan A; there wasn’t any plan B.” We accompanied First Officer Judith Niedmers on a flight to San Francisco. Find out more about her way into the cockpit, how she maintains a good work-life-balance and the most emotional moment of her career.

Vienna is a city that is full of contrasts. You can relax in any of the numerous coffee houses, devote yourself entirely to its art and culture, or explore the trendy shops and cool bars in the burgeoning “in” quarters. More recommendations on SWISS Explore.

data.text: When evening draws on and the illuminated stately buildings and sights of the city stand out against the clear sky, then everybody is captivated by the unique magic of Budapest. Find out more about the unique city on SWISS Explore.

The once-in-a-generation Fête des Vignerons draws hundreds of thousands of visitors to the town of Vevey in summer 2019. Learn more about the event and the design of our special livery in our latest blog post.
New month – new Instagramer! In February Kerstin will be offering you an insight into her exciting life as a SWISS Flight Attendant. Find out more about her in our current blog post.

SWISS unveils a special livery in honour of the Fête des Vignerons 2019, which we supports as main partner. The special design, created by artist @_fichtre, is dedicated to one of the oldest traditions in Switzerland and to the people of the Suisse Romande. https://t.co/oMQg3razbN
Some more details of our “Fête de Vignerons” livery. https://t.co/S2ioxMvs3I
Little sneak peek ✈️ https://t.co/aueS25niFc
An amazing light show as part of the unveiling event. https://t.co/Dgr8Ar0KYz
The unveiling event of the special livery in honour of the Fête de Vignerons is ready to welcome it’s guests at @GeneveAeroport. https://t.co/CdTgeLLAEj

Whether spring, summer, autumn or winter – Rome is worth a visit at any time of the year! Let yourself be surprised by the complexity of different architectural styles, its hilly location and the delicious Italian food. Find out more about the historic city on SWISS Explore.

data.text: “I love the friendliness of the people in Bangkok, the spicy food and the obligatory spa and beauty time,” enthuses the Maître de Cabine Sandra. Discover what else the world’s hottest city has to offer on SWISS Explore.

data.text: SWISS is expanding its route network from Geneva by offering a new connection to Larnaca (Cyprus) from 3 July. This coastal resort joins the list of new summer destinations 2019.
The SWISS Experience trainee programme is the key to the aviation sector for the Bachelor graduates Nadine and Constantin. Find out more about their activities in our latest blog post.

The 89th International Lauberhorn Races draw to a close. As always, our cuddly Swissli-aircraft never fail to delight the audience. ✈️

#flyswiss #lauberhorn #wengen #switzerland #lauberhornrennen #worldcupwengen https://t.co/Qu7gIxx5jw

🎶 Our SWISS Pilot Combo will rock the stages yet again at the Lauberhornrennen in Wengen. Will you be there, too? 🎤

#flyswiss #lauberhorn #wengen #switzerland #lauberhornrennen #worldcupwengen https://t.co/SUWrAUUgNy
Enjoy excellent service on board and in the SWISS Lounge at the #Lauberhornrennen. https://t.co/RB8K8RuCfl

🇨🇭 Even though SWISS will not be carrying out a display flight at this year’s Lauberhornrennen, you can still look forward to some of our highlights next to the slopes. Today marks the opening ceremony with our enchanting cabin crew.
